Miami_Gardens.WHFT-TV: WHFT-TV, virtual channel 45 (UHF digital channel 46), is a religious television station licensed to Miami, Florida, United States and also serving Fort Lauderdale. It is an owned-and-operated station of the Trinity Broadcasting Network (TBN), a Christian broadcasting ministry based in Santa Ana, California. WHFT maintains studio and transmitter facilities located at the Lake Trinity Estates complex on Pembroke Road in Hollywood, Florida.
